amendment.description: To require a report on enabling capabilities for Special Operations forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1758 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1758 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S8025-8029; text: CR S8027) To require a report on enabling capabilities for Special Operations forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1758 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1758 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
